doc: structs are used with to construct actions.

fields.doc: The stock id for the action, or the name of an icon from the icon theme.
fields.name: stock_id

fields.doc:
The label for the action. This field should typically be marked for translation, see . If @label is 

null
, the label of the stock item with id @stock_id is used.
fields.name: label

fields.doc: The accelerator for the action, in the format understood by .
fields.name: accelerator

fields.doc: The tooltip for the action. This field should typically be marked for translation, see .
fields.name: tooltip

fields.doc: The function to call when the action is activated.
fields.name: callback

name: ActionEntry
